name: Good Dog (BahmGames)
description: How to be a a Step-By-Step Guide! Step 1: Bark to say "Hi" to people! Step 2:  Strike a Pose and see their reactions! Step 3: Pick up Heavy Rocks and put them on buttons! Step 4: Bark at crates to break them open! Step 5: Pick up and return everyone's lost items! This game was made in one week as an entry for GJL Game Parade-Spring 2022.  The game incorporates the jam's theme of "Every Life Counts" in that, to a Dog, every life counts. They love and want to help everyone they meet, and that is precisely the goal of the game! 3rd Party Assets Used: Dog Sprite and Animations: Jinxedbyte on itch.io Game Background Music: Michael DB on FreeSound.org Menu/Win Screen Music: Migfus20 on FreeSound.org Easy Spline Path 2D: Unity Asset Store Sound Effects: Pro Sound Collection(Purchased through Humble Bundle, no longer listed on store)
